Returns: the item at position in this buffer.
Parameters: The position of the item to retrieve.
get(int).Description: Get the item at the specified position. Note that the objects returned from subsequent invocations of this method for the same position may not be identical objects, but will be equal in value. In other words: buffer.get(i) == buffer.get(i) may return false. buffer.get(i).equals(buffer.get(i)) will return true.

Parameters: Row index of underlying DataHolder to construct an entry for.
The number of children underneath the given entry.
getEntry(int, int).Description: Subclasses must implement this method to get an entry for the provided rowIndex.
getEntry(int, int).FullName: protected Invitation getEntry (int rowIndex, int numChildren)

Returns: The name of a column in the data holder that is guaranteed to change when the primary data type transitions to another instance (typically an ID of the primary data type).
getPrimaryDataMarkerColumn().Description: Subclasses must implement this method to indicate a column in the data holder that can be used to determine where the boundaries between the primary data entities occur. Note that the column must contain a String value.
